testcase.classname: As a user, I want to be able to sign into my account in the Mercury tours website
testcase.name: Sign in with valid details (Happy path)
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the NewTours landing page.....................................passed When I click on the SignOn link.............................................passed And I enter valid username as "GAde" and Password as "123456"...............passed Then I should be able to sign into my account...............................passed
